text.name: input_ADbunkerUnloadType
text.text: AD: Æflæs i trailer eller BGA

text.name: input_ADToggleLoadByFillLevel
text.text: AD: Toggle loading by fill level

text.name: AD_Wrong_Mode_takeover_from_CP
text.text: Forkert AD indstilling til at virke med CP

text.name: gui_ad_collisionHeigth_tooltip
text.text: Indstilling af kollision detektering i fronten af køretøjet. Hvis andre køretøjer ikke er detekteret under kørsel, reducere trin for trin. (Default 2m)

text.name: gui_ad_blinkValue_tooltip
text.text: Vinklen for at aktivere blinklys. (0 = automatisk blinklyst deaktiveret)

text.name: gui_ad_lookahead_turning_tooltip
text.text: Distancen køretøjet kigger fremad for at justere styrringen til næste segment

text.name: gui_ad_useFastestRoute_tooltip
text.text: Tager hastigheden i betragtning istedet for en simpel distance udregning, ved udregningen af ruten

text.name: gui_ad_mapMarkerDetour_tooltip
text.text: Maximum afvigelse for at ungå mål

text.name: gui_ad_siloEmpty_tooltip
text.text: Hvordan AI-medarbejderen reagere til en tom silo

text.name: gui_ad_useFolders_tooltip
text.text: Brug mapper til at strukturer mål

text.name: gui_ad_BSMRange_tooltip
text.text: In this range vehicles to destination bunker silo one by one get driveway

text.name: gui_ad_autoConnect_start_tooltip
text.text: Autostilslut til en passende node ved start af optagelse

text.name: gui_ad_autoConnect_end_tooltip
text.text: Autostilslut til en passende node ved slut af optagelse

text.name: gui_ad_parkInField_tooltip
text.text: Efter aflæsning af en mejetærsker - hvis den ikke er parkeret i afgrøder

text.name: gui_ad_unloadFillLevel_tooltip
text.text: Efter tømming af mejetærsker. kør til aflevering ved dette påfyldnignsniveau.

text.name: gui_ad_gui_scale_tooltip
text.text: Leave default to use in game scaling settings

text.name: gui_ad_notifications_tooltip
text.text: Visnigstid for notifikationer: Frakoblet / ca. 2,5s / 5s / 10s / 25s / Vis indtil bruger lukker

text.name: gui_ad_driverWages_tooltip
text.text: AI-medarbejder løn vil blive ganget med denne værdi

text.name: gui_ad_showNextPath_tooltip
text.text: Til/Frakoble visningen af de næste 2 punkter

text.name: gui_ad_avoidFruit_tooltip
text.text: Mejetærsker aflæser forsøger at undgå afgrøder

text.name: gui_ad_pathFinderTime_tooltip
text.text: Determines how far pathfinding algorithm is allowed to search for collision free path to/from combine. Should only be slightly increased in case fruit avoid on large fields with sufficient headland is not working.

text.name: gui_ad_lineHeight_tooltip
text.text: Linie højde i editor mode. enten på jord-niveau eller over køretøjet

text.name: gui_ad_enableTrafficDetection_tooltip
text.text: Advanced collision detection, which also detects AI-traffic, signs, fences etc. Off, detect FS 22 or FS 19 collision

text.name: gui_ad_shovelWidth_tooltip
text.text: Hvis automatisk detekteret og skovl breden er for lille, kan den øges med denne værdi

text.name: gui_ad_rotateTargets_tooltip
text.text: 4 Modes: Ingen ændring af mål / Kun opsamlings mål / Kun afleverings mål / opsamling og afleverings mål . i mappe bliver skiftet (ikke i default mappe) (Kun i den aktive mappe)

text.name: gui_ad_maxTriggerDistance_tooltip
text.text: Distance til målet hvor triggeren er detekteret og aktiveret.

text.name: gui_ad_useBeaconLights_tooltip
text.text: Ja - Brug rotor-blink automatisk uden for marken / Nej - rotor-blink vil ikke tænde og slukke automatisk

text.name: gui_ad_worklightsWhenLoading_tooltip
text.text: Ja - brug arbejdslys ved pålæsning og aflæsning ved en trigger

text.name: gui_ad_worklightsWhenSilo_tooltip
text.text: Ja - Brug arbejdslys ved bunker silo

text.name: gui_ad_hazardLightReverse_tooltip
text.text: Ja - Brug Haveri blink i mens der bakkes

text.name: gui_ad_restrictToField_tooltip
text.text: If unloader is already parked in the field, he will limit the pathfinder to field boundaries.

text.name: gui_ad_showTooltips_tooltip
text.text: Show tooltips of buttons in the HUD.

text.name: gui_ad_autoRefuel_tooltip
text.text: Drive to refuel destination (close to refuel trigger) when fuel level is low.

text.name: gui_ad_autoRepair_tooltip
text.text: Drive to workshop destination (close to repair trigger) when wear level is too high.

text.name: gui_ad_shovelHeight_tooltip
text.text: If automatically detected shovel height is incorrect. Use this to adjust the target ground height

text.name: gui_ad_showMarkersOnMap_tooltip
text.text: Show markers/destinations on the ingame map

text.name: gui_ad_switchToMarkersOnMap_tooltip
text.text: Set target/unload target when clicking on map hotspots

text.name: gui_ad_cornerSpeed_tooltip
text.text: Adjust corner speed for individual vehicle. Mass and current speed will still impact brake point

text.name: gui_ad_callSecondUnloader_tooltip
text.text: Call 2. Unloader when the current unloader reaches the precall fill level

text.name: gui_ad_followOnlyOnField_tooltip
text.text: Restrict unloader to field while actively unloading

text.name: gui_ad_addSettingsToHUD_tooltip
text.text: Adds buttons to the HUD to change settings without opening this menu

text.name: gui_ad_iconSetToUse_tooltip
text.text: Default logo or personalized logo - Selection can be expanded.

text.name: gui_ad_secondEditorModeAllowed_tooltip
text.text: Use 2. editor mode for route manipulation instead of holding down LCTRL

text.name: gui_ad_wideHUD_tooltip
text.text: Use wide HUD mode, which also allows a few more setting buttons in the HUD

text.name: gui_ad_playSounds_tooltip
text.text: Enables the sound effects for mouse clicks and notifications

text.name: gui_ad_syncMultiTargets_tooltip
text.text: Multiple drivers using the same folder for multiple targets will synchronize next targets

text.name: gui_ad_enableParkAtJobFinished_tooltip
text.text: Only available in Modes Pickup and Deliver, Deliver: If Job is finished, stored parking position of vehicle / attachment will be driven to. On Dedi-Server only available for vehicle parking place!

text.name: gui_ad_autoTipSide_tooltip
text.text: Yes - AutoDrive select tip side automatically / No - the already selected tip side will be used

text.name: gui_ad_autoTrailerCover_tooltip
text.text: Yes - AutoDrive open and close trailer covers as needed / No - trailer covers will not be opened or closed by AutoDrive

text.name: gui_ad_useForwardTurningManoeuvre_tooltip
text.text: Yes - AutoDrive unloaders try to plan a path forwards to adapt to 90° turns of the combine. / No - Unloaders will reverse before turn

text.name: gui_ad_ALUnload_tooltip
text.text: Off-no automatic unload, center-unload on loading platform, left / right vehicle unload position (Position depend on vehicle setup, not AD!)

text.name: gui_ad_ALUnloadWaitTime_tooltip
text.text: Wait time after un-/loading, before continue to drive - useful for loading at productions or unload center: 0-no wait, wait selected time

text.name: gui_ad_scanConfirmationText
text.text: Should AutoDrive generate a route network from the traffic and helper data on the map?

text.name: gui_ad_noHarvesterAvailable
text.text: No harvester with same target found

text.name: gui_ad_noUnloaderAvailable
text.text: No driver with same target available

text.name: gui_ad_remainingDriveTimeInterval_tooltip
text.text: For external mods: Interval to calculate the remaining drive time. In case of issues with performance increase or deactivate.

text.name: gui_ad_adpd_showError
text.text: AutoDrive: The Network is inconsistent and could not be imported, error code

text.name: gui_ad_adpd_showConfirmation
text.text: AutoDrive: Would you like to import the AD Network from the Placeable?

text.name: gui_ad_pathfinder_tooltip
text.text: Choose which pathfinder algorithm is used (when not on network)

text.name: gui_ad_enableRoutesManagerOnDediServer_tooltip
text.text: Enable route manager on dedicated servers

text.name: gui_ad_detectSwath_tooltip
text.text: Decides if swaths are detected as fruit on field

text.name: gui_ad_colorAssignmentMode_tooltip
text.text: Enables selection of custom colors for AutoDrive

text.name: gui_ad_FoldImplements_tooltip
text.text: AutoDrive will wait for implements to fold up before starting

text.name: gui_ad_RecordWhileNotInVehicle_tooltip
text.text: AutoDrive will keep recording if driver leaves the vehicle

text.name: gui_ad_settingsClosingDialog_text
text.text: Are you sure you want to close the settings without saving?

text.name: gui_ad_routeExportWarn_text
text.text: Are you sure you want to overwrite the existing route?

text.name: gui_ad_routeDeleteWarn_text
text.text: Are you sure you want to delete the route '%s'?

text.name: ad_color_default
text.text: 04 waypoint on single and reverse connection

text.name: ad_color_closestLine
text.text: 13 line from vehicle to closest waypoint

text.name: ad_color_editorHeightLine
text.text: 14 line from surface waypoint to the one above vehicle

text.name: ad_color_previewSubPrioSingleConnection
text.text: 17 curve preview OK, secondary single-way connection

text.name: ad_color_previewSubPrioDualConnection
text.text: 18 curve preview OK, secondary dual-way connection

text.name: ad_color_textInputBackground
text.text: 21 Background for inputs of text, targets etc.

text.name: ad_color_hudTextHover
text.text: 23 HUD text, hovering on normal items

text.name: ad_color_hudTextSpecial
text.text: 24 HUD text, active items and folders

text.name: ad_color_hudTextHoverSpecial
text.text: 25 HUD text, hovering on active items and folders

text.name: gui_ad_combineCPADHudMouse_tooltip
text.text: off: default / simple: CP: sec mouse action > mouse on + off, AD: Toggle Hud > both huds on + off / full: as simple but huds toggle in single steps / Required: Disable right click HUD at CP settings

text.name: gui_ad_editorTip_5
text.text: LSHIFT = Toggle point as side road

text.name: gui_ad_editorTip_9
text.text: 1. node is intersection, second it's neighbor:
